text:
Hi Everyone,
Does anyone know if/when the <https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/workflows/manage-crm-record-associations-with-workflows|“Manage CRM record associations with workflows”> beta is supposed to go back online? I had requested access to it a few weeks ago, but my company’s rep mentioned that the devs had discovered a bug and temporarily restricted access. If anyone has any updates, I’d greatly appreciate it!

<@U07DAERNLCR> - If you go to your Product Update page in HubSpot, are you able to see this?
New Workflow Actions for Associations
